summary: This mod changes the behavior of bleeding damage obtained via the perks Limbsplitter and Hack and Slash.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the behavior of bleeding damage obtained via the perks \"Limbsplitter\" and \"Hack and Slash\". In the unmodified game bleeding damage and duration varies depending on weapon material and perk rank, and is often considered neglible and a waste of perk points. This mod seeks to rectify that.

Requirements:
*Skyrim v1.8 or higher

Changes from vanilla:
* Unified damage over time independent of weapon material
* Unified duration of effect (10 sec)
* Damage Total Rank 1: 15 points
* Damage Total Rank 2: 30 points
* Damage Total Rank 3: 50 points
* Bleeding damage from axes no longer stacks from multiple strikes on a single opponent
author: MAD

files.name: MADs Axe Bleeding Rebalance v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Removed ability to stack bleeding damage by striking an opponent multiple times.

files.name: MADs Axe Bleeeding Rebalance v1_1a
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a bug that could cause problems with applying other perks\' effects. Application of bleeding damage now has the same priorty as in the unmodified game when compared to other \"Apply Combat Hit Spell\" entry points.
Saved under the new 1.5.24.0 version of the Creation Kit. Since underlying data changes were made to the game the mod now requires Skyrim version 1.5 or higher.

files.name: MADs Axe Bleeding Rebalance v1_1b
files.changelogHtml: Changed EditorIDs on added spells to new naming convention, no effect on gameplay. All added IDs now start with prefix MAD

files.name: MAD Axe Bleeding Rebalance v1_1c
files.changelogHtml: Saved under the new Creation Kit version 1.8.151.0
